Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2013 11:41AM Cheri9724 wrote: I am having a double mastectomy and DIEP reconstruction and ovaries removed on April 10, 2013.  I have had no chemo or rads yet.  This site has been very helpful to me and I wanted to let you know I'll be joining you as an April patient.  :) :( Cheri
